requirements.summary: Remove the custom favicon link from frontend/index.html and revert to default/no favicon
acceptanceCriteria: The custom favicon link tag is removed from frontend/index.html
No custom icon or logo is displayed in the browser tab

file_operations.description: Remove the custom favicon link tag that references the dog-and-cat icon. This will revert the browser tab to showing no custom icon (default browser behavior).

requirements.summary: Remove any generated icon/logo image files from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: All custom icon/logo files are deleted from the assets directory

file_operations.description: Delete the generated favicon image file from the assets directory to remove all traces of the custom icon.
Delete the generated icon image file from the assets directory to ensure no orphaned logo files remain.
